ygData.subject: RE: Kizdean Gix and the Eldritch Collective
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure about Kizdean, but the eldritch collective seems to have a limited set of quests to improve their faction.  I have not done the observer staff quest,
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure about Kizdean, but the eldritch collective seems to have a limited
set of quests to improve their faction. I have not done the observer staff
quest, but I suspect that one will give eldritch faction. There is also a
quest (also never done) to kill the clockwork in the middle of the lesser
fay fairy camp that I believe gives both gemchopper and eldritch faction.
The Bugglegup and the lens quests were still broken last time I checked
(about 3 months ago) so I have no idea if it is possible to use those to
improve faction.

Does anybody have a list of all gnome NPCs in the world? I don't recall
ever meeting a Noresa...

-----Original Message-----
From: MadGrizzle [mailto:MadGrizzle@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 9:21 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Kizdean Gix and the Eldritch Collective


From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>

Does anyone know the relationship between Kizdean Gix and the Eldritch
Collective. He's an inkie that spawns behind Inn 1 in West Commons. When
you kill him, you get faction adjustment for the Eldritch Collective and he
drops Noresa's purse. I went around the Library of Mechamagica and asked
'who is Kizdean', 'who is Kizdean Gix', and 'who is Noresa' and got no
responses... Anyone have any clue why killing Kizdean gives you a faction
adjustment with the Eldritch Collective... Also, what is everyones faction
with them.. I have been trying to improve it but still stuck at Amiable.

Madix/Atinky
27Wiz/26Rogue (gnomes)
Bristlebane Server
